question: Display podcasts and audio documents lasting 60 minutes.
sql_query1:
SELECT Podcasts.title
FROM Podcasts
WHERE Podcasts.Length = 60
UNION
SELECT AudioDocuments.title
FROM AudioDocuments
WHERE AudioDocuments.Length = 60
sql_query2:
SELECT Podcasts.title
FROM Podcasts
UNION
SELECT AudioDocuments.title
FROM AudioDocuments
WHERE AudioDocuments.Length = 60
interpretation1: What podcasts and audio documents are 60 minutes long?
interpretation2: List all podcasts and also display audio documents lasting 60 minutes.
